item.title: GOPNIK AND THE SLAV SQUAT
item.description: Description Have you ever seen a Russian in a tracksuit (Adidas or something resembling it), a beer bottle in hand, cigarette hanging from their lips, squatting with flat feet? Then you’ve likely spotted a true gopnik (m) or gopnitsa (f).

item.title: Hidden treasures: Kladmen (The Dropman)
item.description: Searching and finding The kladman often has to search as well. For suitable and always new places and ways to hide the goods. In such a way that they can be found by those looking, without being seen by those who don’t know.

item.title: Russia and LGBT etc.
item.description: Legislation Reactions from that time to the law in Russia’s anti-gay law (The Economist, 2013, 8 m) and Putin signs law banning homosexual ‘propaganda’ (Euronews, 2013, 1 m). See also Russia: ‘Gay propaganda’ law remains in place, but complaints against it continue (CRIN).

item.title: Russian Lives (The Russians & Living in Russia)
item.description: The Russians 2 x For the German broadcaster DW, Juri Rescheto (Twitter, profile) traveled through Russia to create the documentary described above. The lives of ordinary Russians, in two parts, titled The Russians – an intimate journey through Russia (2020, 2 x 42 m).

item.title: In Your Face: Russian Face Tattoos
item.description: Rappers Face, Kizaru, Ганвест, Morgenshtern (who regrets it), Скруджи and many more. All of them have tattoos на лице (on their faces). It sometimes seems more important than their skills. So far, only men are listed. No female Russian rapper with a face tattoo has been found (yet).

item.title: Love Love Love: all you need is Ljoebov
item.description: By Sandhya Daisy Sundaram IMDb, Vimeo That ‘Sundance-winning’ refers to this award at a Sundance Institute. There is also a short (2 m) Making Of. Read: ‘Love. Love. Love.’ in Russian winters (Russia Beyond, 2014).
